synopsis.text:
Paul Tuck and Tracy Headly, two detectives from the Ace Detective Agency, find their mundane lives disrupted when a mysterious girl named Princess Sara appears in their office. Dressed in peculiar attire, Sara reveals she hails from the Kingdom of Fir antic, a realm locked in a power struggle between two royal houses. The prize? The throne, which can only be claimed by the one who retrieves the mythical Firebird from the annals of time.

As Sara shares her quest, the detectives are taken aback by her telepathic abilities and the revelation that they are destined to marry and become her ancestors. With their future at stake, Paul and Tracy vow to help Sara in her search for the Firebird. The only lead they have is the presence of Princess Miranda and her party, who possess crucial information about the elusive creature.

In this thrilling and humorous adventure, our heroes must navigate the complexities of time travel and royal politics to secure the Firebird and ensure the rightful ruler ascends the throne of the enigmatic Kingdom of Fir antic.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
